titleStmt.title: Anapausis. Rest for the restlesse soule. By Archibald Symmer, minister of the gospell
titleStmt.author: Symmer, Archibald.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for William Sheres,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
Running title reads: An exhortation to come unto Christ.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
